title: reg_resample
description: Tool for resampling floating images to the reference image space using different transformations.

affine_transform.title: Affine Transformation
affine_transform.description: Filename which contains an affine transformation (Affine*Reference=Floating)

flirt_affine_transform.title: Flirt Affine Transformation
flirt_affine_transform.description: Filename which contains a radiological flirt affine transformation

control_point_grid.title: Control Point Grid
control_point_grid.description: Filename of the control point grid image (from reg_f3d)

deformation_field.title: Deformation Field
deformation_field.description: Filename of the deformation field image (from reg_transform)

resampled_blank.title: Resampled Blank Grid
resampled_blank.description: Filename of the resampled blank grid

nearest_neighbor.title: Nearest Neighbor Interpolation
nearest_neighbor.description: Use a Nearest Neighbor interpolation for the source resampling (cubic spline by default)

linear_interpolation.title: Linear Interpolation
linear_interpolation.description: Use a Linear interpolation for the source resampling (cubic spline by default)
